00045   
00049   template <class InputIterator_>
00050   class iterator2stream
00051   {
00052     InputIterator_ current_,end_;
00053     
00055     iterator2stream() {};
00056   public:
00058     typedef typename std::iterator_traits<InputIterator_>::value_type value_type;
00059       
00060     iterator2stream(InputIterator_ begin,InputIterator_ end): 
00061       current_(begin),end_(end) {}
00062     
00063     iterator2stream(const iterator2stream & a): current_(a.current_),end_(a.end_) {}
00064        
00066     const value_type & operator * () const
00067     {
00068       return *current_;
00069     }
00070     
00072     iterator2stream &  operator ++()
00073     {
00074       assert(end_ != current_);
00075       ++current_;
00076       return *this;
00077     }
00078     
00080     bool empty() const
00081     {
00082       return (current_==end_);
00083     }
00084   };
00085   
00090   template <class InputIterator_> 
00091   iterator2stream<InputIterator_> streamify(InputIterator_ begin,InputIterator_ end)
00092   {
00093     return iterator2stream<InputIterator_>(begin,end);
00094   }
00095   
00098   template <class OutputIterator_,class StreamAlgorithm_>
00103   OutputIterator_ materialize(StreamAlgorithm_ & in,OutputIterator_ out)
00104   {
00105     while(!in.empty())
00106     {
00107       *out = *in;
00108       ++out;
00109       ++in;
00110     }
00111     return out;
00112   }
00113 
00114   
00118   template <class Generator_>
00119   class generator2stream
00120   {
00121   public:
00123     typedef typename Generator_::value_type value_type;
00124   private:
00125     Generator_ gen_;
00126     value_type current_;
00127     
00129     generator2stream() {};
00130   public:
00131       
00132     generator2stream(Generator_ g): 
00133       gen_(g), current_(gen_()) {}
00134     
00135     generator2stream(const generator2stream & a): gen_(a.gen_),current_(a.current_) {}
00136        
00138     const value_type & operator * () const
00139     {
00140       return current_;
00141     }
00142     
00144     generator2stream &  operator ++()
00145     {
00146       current_ = gen_();
00147       return *this;
00148     }
00149     
00151     bool empty() const
00152     {
00153       return false;
00154     }
00155   };
00156   
00160   template <class Generator_> 
00161   generator2stream<Generator_> streamify(Generator_ gen_)
00162   {
00163     return generator2stream<Generator_>(gen_);
00164   }
00165   
00166   struct Stopper {};
00167   
00179   template <class Operation_, class Input1_,
00180                               class Input2_ = Stopper,
00181                               class Input3_ = Stopper,
00182                               class Input4_ = Stopper,
00183                               class Input5_ = Stopper,
00184                               class Input6_ = Stopper
00185            >
00186   class transform
00187   {
00188     Operation_ op;
00189     Input1_ & i1;
00190     Input2_ & i2;
00191     Input3_ & i3;
00192     Input4_ & i4;
00193     Input5_ & i5;
00194     Input6_ & i6;
00195    public:
00197     typedef typename Operation_::value_type value_type;
00198    
00199    private:
00200     value_type current;
00201    public:
00202     
00204     transform(Operation_ o,Input1_ & i1_,Input2_ & i2_,Input3_ & i3_,Input4_ & i4_,
00205       Input5_ & i5_,Input5_ & i6_):
00206         op(o),i1(i1_),i2(i2_),i3(i3_),i4(i4_),i5(i5_),i6(i6_),
00207         current(op(*i1,*i2,*i3,*i4,*i5,*i6)){}
00208       
00210     const value_type & operator * () const
00211     {
00212       return current;
00213     }
00214     
00216     transform &  operator ++()
00217     {
00218       ++i1;
00219       ++i2;
00220       ++i3;
00221       ++i4;
00222       ++i5;
00223       ++i6;
00224       
00225       if(!empty())
00226         current = op(*i1,*i2,*i3,*i4,*i5,*i6);
00227       
00228       return *this;
00229     }
00230     
00232     bool empty() const
00233     {
00234       return i1.empty() || i2.empty() || i3.empty() || 
00235         i4.empty() || i5.empty() || i6.empty();
00236     }
00237   };
00238

00248   template <class Operation_, class Input1_
00249            >
00250   class transform<Operation_,Input1_,Stopper,Stopper,Stopper,Stopper,Stopper>
00251   {
00252     Operation_ op;
00253     Input1_ & i1;
00254    public:
00256     typedef typename Operation_::value_type value_type;
00257     
00258    private:
00259     value_type current;
00260    public:
00261     
00263     transform(Operation_ o,Input1_ & i1_):op(o),i1(i1_),
00264       current(op(*i1)){}
00265       
00267     const value_type & operator * () const
00268     {
00269       return current;
00270     }
00271     
00273     transform &  operator ++()
00274     {
00275       ++i1;
00276       if(!empty())
00277         current = op(*i1);
00278       
00279       return *this;
00280     }
00281     
00283     bool empty() const
00284     {
00285       return i1.empty();
00286     }
00287   };

00539   template < class Input1_,
00540              class Input2_,
00541              class Input3_ = Stopper,
00542              class Input4_ = Stopper,
00543              class Input5_ = Stopper,
00544              class Input6_ = Stopper
00545            >
00546   class make_tuple
00547   {
00548     Input1_ & i1;
00549     Input2_ & i2;
00550     Input3_ & i3;
00551     Input4_ & i4;
00552     Input5_ & i5;
00553     Input6_ & i6;
00554     
00555   public:
00557     typedef typename stxxl::tuple< 
00558                        typename Input1_::value_type, 
00559                        typename Input2_::value_type, 
00560                        typename Input3_::value_type, 
00561                        typename Input4_::value_type, 
00562                        typename Input5_::value_type, 
00563                        typename Input6_::value_type  
00564                           >  value_type;
00565   
00566   private:
00567     value_type current;
00568   public:
00569     
00571     make_tuple(
00572       Input1_ & i1_,
00573       Input2_ & i2_,
00574       Input3_ & i3_,
00575       Input4_ & i4_,
00576       Input5_ & i5_,
00577       Input6_ & i6_
00578       ):
00579         i1(i1_),i2(i2_),i3(i3_),i4(i4_),i5(i5_),i6(i6_),
00580         current(value_type(*i1,*i2,*i3,*i4,*i5,*i6)) {}
00581       
00583     const value_type & operator * () const
00584     {
00585       return current;
00586     }
00587     
00589     make_tuple &  operator ++()
00590     {
00591       ++i1;
00592       ++i2;
00593       ++i3;
00594       ++i4;
00595       ++i5;
00596       ++i6;
00597       
00598       if(!empty())
00599         current = value_type(*i1,*i2,*i3,*i4,*i5,*i6);
00600       
00601       return *this;
00602     }
00603     
00605     bool empty() const
00606     {
00607       return i1.empty() || i2.empty() || i3.empty() || 
00608           i4.empty() || i5.empty() || i6.empty();
00609     }
00610   };

00619   template < class Input1_,
00620              class Input2_
00621            >
00622   class make_tuple<Input1_,Input2_,Stopper,Stopper,Stopper,Stopper>
00623   {
00624     Input1_ & i1;
00625     Input2_ & i2;
00626     
00627   public:
00629     typedef typename stxxl::tuple< 
00630                        typename Input1_::value_type, 
00631                        typename Input2_::value_type 
00632                           >  value_type;
00633   
00634   private:
00635     value_type current;
00636   public:
00637     
00639     make_tuple(
00640       Input1_ & i1_,
00641       Input2_ & i2_
00642       ):
00643         i1(i1_),i2(i2_),
00644         current(value_type(*i1,*i2)) {}
00645       
00647     const value_type & operator * () const
00648     {
00649       return current;
00650     }
00651     
00653     make_tuple &  operator ++()
00654     {
00655       ++i1;
00656       ++i2;
00657       
00658       if(!empty())
00659         current = value_type(*i1,*i2);
00660       
00661       return *this;
00662     }
00663     
00665     bool empty() const
00666     {
00667       return i1.empty() || i2.empty();
00668     }
00669   };

00886   template <class Input_,int Which>
00887   class choose
00888   {
00889   };
00890   
00897   template <class Input_>
00898   class choose<Input_,1>
00899   {
00900     Input_ & in;
00901     
00902     typedef typename Input_::value_type  tuple_type;
00903   public:
00904     
00906     typedef typename tuple_type::first_type value_type;
00907   
00908   private:
00909     value_type current;
00910   public:
00911     
00913     choose( Input_ & in_):
00914         in(in_),
00915         current((*i).first) {}
00916       
00918     const value_type & operator * () const
00919     {
00920       return current;
00921     }
00922     
00924     choose &  operator ++()
00925     {
00926       ++in;
00927     
00928       if(!empty())
00929         current = (*in).first;
00930       
00931       return *this;
00932     }
00933     
00935     bool empty() const
00936     {
00937       return in.empty();
00938     }
00939   };

01047   template <class Input_>
01048   class choose<Input_,4>
01049   {
01050     Input_ & in;
01051     
01052     typedef typename Input_::value_type  tuple_type;
01053   public:
01054     
01056     typedef typename tuple_type::fourth_type value_type;
01057   
01058   private:
01059     value_type current;
01060   public:
01061     
01063     choose( Input_ & in_):
01064         in(in_),
01065         current((*i).fourth) {}
01066

01069     {
01070       return current;
01071     }

01075     {
01076       ++in;
01077

01080       
01081       return *this;
01082     }

01088     }
